sentence.Network_en: The guerrillas were promised safe conduct out of the country.
sentence.Network_cn: 游击队员得到承诺，可以安全离开这个国家。

sentence.Network_en: Her family was given safe conduct to Britain when civil war broke out.
sentence.Network_cn: 内战爆发时，她全家获得了前往英国的安全通行许可。

sentence.Network_en: The robbers wanted safe conduct to the airport for themselves and their hostages.
sentence.Network_cn: 劫匪要求保证他们自己以及他们劫持的人质去机场的安全.
